description: The JAWS Command line client. Run: jaws help <command> for help with a specific command.

dont-exe-cf.description: Write the CloudFormation configuration only - do not execute it.

name.description: Name for the newly created resource

endpoint.description: Create an API Gateway endpoint for this AWSM Lambda

runtime.description: Runtime for this AWSM Lambda. Defaults to nodejs

package-manager.description: Specify a package manager to scaffold for publishing this AWSM Lambda

email.description: Email address to receive CloudFormation notifications

aws-profile.description: Named AWS admin profile to use from ~/.aws/credentials

tag-all.description: Tag all lambdas|endpoints in this project for deployment

list-all.description: List all lambdas|endpoints tagged for deployment in this project

untag-all.description: Untag all lambdas|endpoints in this project for deployment

tagged.description: Deploy all tagged lambdas|endpoints in the project. The default is to deploy the current working directory only.

lambda.description: Create a new AWSM Lambda. Optionally create an API Gateway endpoint for it at the same time.

endpoint.description: Create a new API Gateway endpoint.

region.description: Create a new AWS Region configuration in this JAWS Project.

stage.description: Create a new stage in this JAWS Project.

tag.description: Tag/untag Lambda functions and API Gateway endpoints for deployment.

list.description: List environment variables for a stage and region. Example: jaws env list --stage prod --region all

get.description: Get the environment variable value for a given stage and region. Example: jaws env get JAWS_STAGE --stage prod --region all

set.description: Set an environment varirable for a given stage and region. Example: jaws env set TABLE_NAME users --region us-east-1 --stage prod

unset.description: Unset an environment variable for a given stage and region. Example: jaws unset TABLE_NAME --stage prod --region us-east-1

dash.description: Experience the thrill of interactively deploying resources from the cutting-edge JAWS command center.

postinstall.description: Run the post-install automation for an aws-module installed via a package manager. Example: jaws postinstall awsm-users --package-manager npm
